page.title: 07Wilton Park
page.content: Wilton Park is a Royal Army Education Centre,it has three schools.One school teaches officers and soldiers,Maths,English and so on.One school is the Defence School Of Languages which teaches English to foreign students and Russian,Arabic and German to English students. Wilton Park has lots of amenities such as:youth club,ladies club,naafi shop,naafi club, bar,disco.Tennis,squash,badminton courts,a gym and cricket,football,rugby hockey,basketball pitches. It also has a firing range and an assult course.The soldiers and officers have breakfast at 7.15a.m.(sometimes they do errands before breakfast)they start their work at 8.30a.m.and usually finish between 4.30 and 5.00p.m.There is usually on average about 500 people at Wilton Park.30 of these are gurkas.
